name: df-irreflexive
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1
body: |- wb(wirreflexive(c0, c1), wa(wss(c0, cxp(c1, c1)), wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))))))
comment: Define irreflexive relation; relation ` R ` is irreflexive over the set ` A ` iff ` A. x e. A -. x R x ` . Note that a relation can be neither reflexive nor irreflexive. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 1-Dec-2019.)
